title: Old Video of 2017 Student Protests Shared as ‘Kashmir Burning’
subtitle: Viral Video on Kashmir Burning After Revocation of Article 370 Fact Check: Thevideo is from 2017, when students clashed with security forces in solidarity with the students of Pulwama Degree College, where over 50 students were injured.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral video on Facebook claims to show Kashmir ‘burning’ in the aftermath of the Centre's move to effectively revoke Article 370.

The post: “कश्मीर जल रहा है। मोदी और शाह दुनिया को दिखाने नही दे रहे आप दिखाये कम से कम दुनिया को बताएं।ये ज़ालिम ज़ुल्म की इन्तेहाँ कर रहे है।"(Kashmir is burning. Modi and Shah are not letting the world see this but at least you should tell the world.)

In the video, security personnel can be seen firing at the protesters as Kashmiri students demand ‘freedom’ on the streets.
